import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; function Projects() { return (
EAT-DA-BURGER! APP

This project follows the MVC design pattern.It is a fun app that allows you to enter any burger you want and keep track of which ones you have devoured and which ones you are yet to eat.

Github Link Deployed App
NOTE-TAKER APP

This project uses express to create API routes to GET, POST and DELETE an object.The purpose of this app is to write, save, retrieve and delete note data from a JSON file.

Github Link Deployed App
VOCABULARY BUILDER APP

The purpose of this project is to help improve an individual's vocabulary by providing various definitions of an inserted word along side at most ten synonyms for better understanding. The app consists of both frontend and backend with at least two APIs used

Github Link Deployed App
TASK.IT APP

The purpose of this project is to help users become more organized with their ideas, activities and tasks. The app enables users to be able to add, edit and delete whatever task they put in and what ever task is entered is saved in local storage so they don't have to worry about not being able to find saved data after refreshing page

Github Link Deployed app
); } export default Projects;
